title: US Navy shoots down ‘aggressively approaching’ Iranian drone in Arabian Sea

The statement added that no American personnel were injured and no equipment was damaged.

This 'gray zone' approach, evident in the South China Sea and beyond, bypasses international law and exploits rivals' hesitation. The cumulative effect creates new facts on the ground, challenging the existing order.

description: Once a Hollywood fantasy, a nation's digital paralysis is now a real threat.  Modern states, deeply interconnected, face coordinated cyber, electronic warfare, and information attacks.  This "Fire Sale" concept, unfolding in phases, targets power, communications, and finance, aiming to destabilize before conflict erupts, posing a significant challenge for digitally dependent nations like India.

title: From tariffs to tailfins: India to scale up US arms and aircraft purchases
description: India has agreed to significantly increase purchases of US petroleum, defense systems, and commercial aircraft, totaling up to $500 billion. This trade deal aims to slash tariffs and deepen economic alignment, particularly in strategic sectors like aviation and defense, reshaping bilateral ties for years to come.

title: Oracle makes a public clarification on the deal that could end up in 30,000 job cuts
description: Oracle is defending its substantial AI partnership with OpenAI amidst reports of potential job cuts to fund infrastructure. Despite a stalled Nvidia deal, Oracle remains confident in OpenAI's funding capabilities. However, the company's massive debt and market cap decline raise investor concerns about its ambitious AI spending plans.

title: Ann Michael starts Super Bowl week strong with bold workout and confident message
description: Ann Michael Maye kicked off Super Bowl 2026 week with a viral workout post as the Patriots prepare to face the Seahawks. From supporting Drake Maye at key playoff moments to launching her NBC Sports Boston show, Ann’s rise mirrors New England’s return to the sport’s biggest stage.

title: 26-year-old fintech startup founder charged with US visa fraud and lying
description: A Turkish tech executive has been indicted for defrauding venture capitalists of $7 million in seed money. Gokce Guven allegedly used false financial statements and fabricated documents to secure investments for her fintech company, Kalder Inc. The proceeds were then used to obtain an O-1A "extraordinary ability" visa through similar misrepresentations.

title: Dodgers target $400M Cy Young deal with Tigers; Sasaki a key trade piece
description: A potential trade between the Los Angeles Dodgers and Detroit Tigers involves Roki Sasaki for Tarik Skubal. This hypothetical deal highlights the Dodgers' focus on immediate championship contention and the Tigers' long-term roster development. The exchange would significantly alter both pitching staffs, with the Dodgers gaining a proven starter and the Tigers acquiring a young arm with future control.
